context: Undergraduate tuition for the 2012/13 school year was <a0_0>$<b5_0>61,240<b5_0/><a0_0/>; this includes the basic tuition of $43,380, fees (health $200, etc.), room and board of $13,329 (less if commuting), books and supplies $1,842, personal expenses $1,890, transportation cost of $400.
